search_results.title: Rico Gagliano - Biography
search_results.snippet: Father is Frank Gagliano, a professor of theater at West Virginia University. Graduated from Mt Lebanon High School (Pittsburgh, PA) in 1987.

search_results.snippet: Biography. Rico is the son of Frank Gagliano, a playwright and theater educator, and Sandra Gagliano, an opera singer and voice instructor. He received his B.A ...
